   Hugar was still wating outside the maximal ship.  He was getting pist and 
bored.  He reached in his leg carpartment and grabed a small bomb.  He 
walked over to a tree and placed the bomb next to it.  He set the bomb to 5 
seconds and walked away. He got just out of range when the bomb blew up.  He 
was sure someone in maximal city could hear the bomb go off.  He found a 
rock and sat down on it wating for someone to notice him and let him in 
maximal city.


OOC: will some maximal check the radar and notice Hugar outside or can a 
maximal relize that no one is checking the radar, and check it.  Please.  
Ohhh Jume, come on, Please...
